author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 4 HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...CATEGORY 4 HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 27.2, -66.9 with movement NW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 933 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 27.2, -66.9 with movement NW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 933 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
